text: Francesc Badia Batalla (10 January 1923 â€“ 14 August 2020) was an Andorran politician and historian. He was the Episcopal Veguer of Andorra from 1972 until 1993. He also was a judge of the Tribunal of the Courts of Andorra over the same time. He was born in Montblanc, Tarragona, Spain. Badia Batalla died on 14 August 2020, aged 97.Francesc Badia Batalla ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Andorran lawyers Category:Judges Category:Historians Category:Andorran politicians
